scripts.test: redis-start && TEST_MODE=local TEST_V1_STATE=true TEST_V2_STATE=true TEST_V1_ADDRESS=true TEST_V2_ADDRESS=true RUST_LOG=forester=debug,forester_utils=debug,light_prover_client=debug cargo test --package forester e2e_test -- --nocapture
scripts.test:compressible: cargo build-sbf -- -p csdk-anchor-full-derived-test && RUST_LOG=forester=debug,light_client=debug cargo test --package forester --test test_compressible_pda --test test_compressible_mint --test test_compressible_ctoken -- --nocapture
